experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: Conduct comprehensive analysis and assessment for multiple projects in Automotive domain.
Lead several projects, ensuring on-time and within-budget delivery while maintaining high levels of quality and customer satisfaction.
Manage and optimize AWS resources, including EC2 instances, S3 storage, RDS databases, and Lambda functions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy tailored AWS solutions using services like AWS CloudFormation and AWS Elastic Beanstalk.

experience.title: Sr. Full Stack Developer
description: Lead analysis, estimation, programming, and unit testing for multiple projects within the Healthcare domain.
Implement GDPR standards across various projects, ensuring compliance with data protection regulations.
Utilize Google Cloud Platform for executing Circle-CI, logging, and deployment processes.
Drive the enhancement of system features, optimizing performance and elevating user experience.
